title: Online Education Based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL) to Enhance Vocational Competencies for Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A customized training environment for current professionals emphasizing public sector employment competency enhancement.

learning_goals: Learners can perform communication skills required for public institution workflows with over 90% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners improve job-related digital document processing skills by over 80% using Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-based materials
Learners enhance workplace conflict resolution abilities by 75% through emotional regulation strategy training

resources: VR Content with Completed Cognitive Accessibility Verification

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
